body.codeblock: <entry> <act classCode="SPCTRT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.31"/> <code code="57074-7" displayName="Labor and delivery process" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <performer typeCode="PRF"> <assignedEntity> <id root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" extension="8044590788"/> <!-- Attender's NPI. It is possible to provide a local state ID as well. --> <code code="76231001" displayName="Osteopath" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMED"/> <assignedPerson classCode="PSN" classCode="PLC" determinerCode="INSTANCE"> <name>Include the name of Facility where delivery occurred</name> <desc nullFlavor="NI"/> </playingEntity> </participantRole> </participant>
